Animal Tracking Object

This repository is a fastly evolving work in progress, with the intent to provide S4 classes to create, edit and expand ATOs.

What is an ATO? Read Hugo’s early vision of the ATO here.

Give it a test drive with webR.

Lastly, review and comment on the current ATO Dictionary.
